schools.name: Petersburg Elementary School
schools.school-summary: Petersburg Elementary School, a public school located in Petersburg, IL, serves grades PK-2 in the Porta Community Unit School District 202.
schools.rating-description: The GreatSchools Rating helps parents compare schools within a state based on a variety of school quality indicators and provides a helpful picture of how effectively each school serves all of its students. Ratings are on a scale of 1 (below average) to 10 (above average) and can include test scores, college readiness, academic progress, advanced courses, equity, discipline and attendance data. We also advise parents to visit schools, consider other information on school performance and programs, and consider family needs as part of the school selection process.

schools.name: Porta High School
schools.school-summary: Porta High School, a public school located in Petersburg, IL, serves grades 7-12 in the Porta Community Unit School District 202.It has received a GreatSchools Rating of 2 out of 10, based on a variety of school quality measures.

schools.name: Porta Central
schools.school-summary: Porta Central, a public school located in Petersburg, IL, serves grades 3-6 in the Porta Community Unit School District 202.It has received a GreatSchools Rating of 4 out of 10, based on a variety of school quality measures.
